Title: Anne LeBaron
Description.abstract: Interview with Anne LeBaron, Los Angeles-based composer, harpist, and Professor of Composition at the Herb Alpert School of Music at CalArts, recorded October 12, 2010 at North Huntley Studios, West Hollywood, California.

Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. Library. Performing Arts Special Collections
Source: Martin Perlich Collection, Conversations in New Music
Title: Morten Lauridsen
Description.abstract: Morten Lauridsen, Los Angeles choral composer and distinguished professor of composition at the University of Southern California, was interviewed at his home in Beachwood Canyon, Los Angeles, on October 13, 2010. He presented his new CD “Sure on This Shining Night” performed by Voce.
